name: SetCustomTableRows
description:
Set values for rows of a custom table.

Use this tool to update or set values for the rows in a specified custom table. It is useful when you need to insert or modify data entries within a developer's custom table.

parameters.name: custom_table_name
parameters.description: The name of the custom table where values will be set. Provide the exact table name as a string.

parameters.name: custom_table_rows_data
parameters.description: JSON array of rows with 'external_key' and 'cells'. Each cell should have 'name' and 'contents' to set values.

cells.description: The contents of the cells in the row. The column name should be the name of the column, and the contents should be the value to insert into the cell. When setting a cell to reference many rows, each reference must be a separate entry in the list.

external_key.description: The external key of the row.

data.description: List of rows to insert or update. All entries must have the same set of column names, with `null` provided to indicate that a value should not be set.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

cells.description: The contents of the cells in the row. The column name should be the name of the column, and the contents should be the value to insert into the cell. When setting a cell to reference many rows, each reference must be a separate entry in the list.

external_key.description: The external key of the row.

data.description: List of rows to insert or update. All entries must have the same set of column names, with `null` provided to indicate that a value should not be set.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
